channel.title: CVE Feed for peachpay -- Related Products for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for peachpay -- Related Products for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-5234|2024-08-02T07:52:08.431Z -- peachpay -- related%20products%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Related Products for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'woo-related' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.3.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
